name: Balance (itch) (Mk_lahane)
description: You need a webcam  to play this game. You control the left car with your left hand and the right car with your right hand. And moving your hands in the respective direction will move the car in the respective lane. Just make sure your hands are in the frame to avoid any kind of problems. Also, while playing the game stay few distances away from the device so that neither of your hand goes out of the frame.
